channel.title: ianwootten.co.uk - Tag: humour
channel.description: I'm a Web Developer working at Nifty Digits in Cardiff, UK. Here, I enjoy talking code - mostly javascript. I'm @iwootten on twitter.

item.title: Undeserved Job Titles
item.author: I.M.Wootten<
item.description:
Today on the return from uni I passed the new Subway that is opening up soon near Queen Street train station. On one of their job adverts, they were advertising for team leaders and sandwich artists. Iâ€™ve never really noticed my sandwiches being arranged in a artistic fashion before, maybe it would brighten my day if they were. I feel sorry for the poor art school graduate who ends up filling baguettes for a living.

Does anyone else have examples of jobs with somewhat over enthusiastic job titles?

item.title: Recipe for Beatbox
item.author: I.M.Wootten<
item.description: This link sent to me by Lewis made me laugh quite a lot. Funnily, it looks a lot like him with a wig on.
